h2_title: Where To Use The Pungent Flesh Chunk in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Using it will cause the First Prince of Flowing Sands boss to spawn. In order to obtain the Loong Scales, you will need to have the boss destroy the wall in the arena with all the small statues. Destroying it will open up a small gap you can pass through to get the Loong Scales.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pungent_Flesh_Chunk.md', within the main section titled 'Pungent Flesh Chunk', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Pungent Flesh Chunk in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Using it will cause the First Prince of Flowing Sands boss to spawn. In order to obtain the Loong Scales, you will need to have the boss destroy the wall in the arena with all the small statues. Destroying it will open up a small gap you can pass through to get the Loong Scales.
